casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Ronald BOWMAN. No. 105P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 11, 2008. Mark Montgomery, Durham, for Bowman, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 656 S.E.2d 638.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of March 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of March 2008."
